attributes.action: cease and disist from aiding and abetting slease and corrupt practice in the House of Lords in particular the practice of members of the House of Lords who are in receipt of salaries and/or remunerations and expenses from public funds to cease receiving the daily attendance allowance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There exists the general practice by members of the House of Lords to take without question their daily attendance allowance even though they are already in receipt of a salary paid from public funds or are only visiting the House for the purpose of partaking breakfast or other meals or refreshments.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
